TextBody:
Hello,

As this is a hotfix it will remain on the update option even after installing.
You can confirm the patch is installed from View Applied patches, and ingnore the entry.
Can you please confirm the server is receiving the logs?

Next to the patch, you will also need to use the client below.

MacOS: https://download.endpointprotector.com/custom_agent/EppClientVulnerability/EPPMac3.0.2.2005.Notarized.tar

Windows: https://download.endpointprotector.com/custom_agent/EppClientVulnerability/EPPClient_v6.2.2.2005.zip

Let me know if you need the client on the server.

Kind regards
__________________
Andrei Pop | Technical Support Engineer
Netwrix Endpoint Protector

This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.
